name: Locked with Zombies
description:
Find the key to unlocked your way !

This game was originally created for the Monthly Jam 4 (2022)  Theme : "Locked".

Rules to survive :
- Use the door to create a path for the zombies
- Find the key to unlocked your way
- Find the maintenance staircase

Credits :
  • Programming and Game Design : Frelude
  • Graphics : my daughter Séli (7yo)
